 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶ֫שֶׁת‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Gen.9.14|Gen 9:14]]</sup> (apparently **masculine** [[2Sam.1.22|2Sam 1:22]] but see [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896) 91</sup>) ==bow== (originally √ perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קושׁ‎</span>, meaning unknown; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡aštu***</u></abbr>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> plural <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> etc.; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְׁתָּא‎</span> and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ט‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[BDB#P|P]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּשְׁטָא‎</span> (rare), all ***bow***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשָּׁתָא‎</span> ***bowman***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bow***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bowman***; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קשת‎</span> ***bow***, Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כשטא‎</span> ([[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>206</sup>); Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קשטא‎</span> ***bowman***); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Hos.1.7|Hos 1:7]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֑שֶׁת‎</span> [[Jer.46.9|Jer 46:9]] +; construct<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶ֫שֶׁת‎</span> [[Hos.1.5|Hos 1:5]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְׁתִּי‎</span> [[Gen.48.22|Gen 48:22]] + ,etc.; plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְשָׁתוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.26.14|2Chr 26:14]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְּׁתֹתָיו‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:20h»§ 20h</sup>) [[Isa.5.28|Isa 5:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְּׁתוֺתָם‎</span> [[Jer.51.56|Jer 51:56]]; [[Ps.37.15|Ps 37:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְּׁתֹתֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Neh.4.7|Neh 4:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְׁתֹּתָיו‎</span> etc., [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [except [[Ps.37.15|Ps 37:15]]]); — 

**1.** ***bow***: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** for hunting [[Gen.27.3|Gen 27:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלְי‎</span>) 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** battle: + (or \|\|) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span> [[Gen.48.22|Gen 48:22]]; [[Josh.24.12|Josh 24:12]] (both [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Hos.1.7|Hos 1:7]]; [[Hos.2.20|Hos 2:20]]; [[1Sam.18.4|1Sam 18:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חְַגֹרוֺ‎</span>), [[2Sam.1.22|2Sam 1:22]]; [[2Kgs.6.22|2Kgs 6:22]]; [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]]; [[Neh.4.7|Neh 4:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמְחֵיהֶם‎</span>), [[Zech.9.13|Zech 9:13]] (figurative of Judah as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s bow), [[Ps.37.15|Ps 37:15]] (figurative) [[Ps.44.7|Ps 44:7]] (+ or \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span> also below) ;+ (or \|\|) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִצִּים‎</span> [[Isa.7.24|Isa 7:24]]; [[2Kgs.13.15|2Kgs 13:15]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.39.3|Ezek 39:3]]; [[Ezek.39.9|Ezek 39:9]]; [[1Chr.12.2|1Chr 12:2]]a; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִשְׁפֵי ק‎</span> [[Ps.76.4|Ps 76:4]] = arrow (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנֵן וְחֶרֶב‎</span>) so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּן ק‎</span> [[Job.41.20|Job 41:20]] (compare [[Lam.3.13|Lam 3:13]]; [[Job.5.7|Job 5:7]]); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲנִית‎</span> [[Ps.46.10|Ps 46:10]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּידוֺן‎</span> [[Jer.6.23|Jer 6:23]]; [[Jer.50.42|Jer 50:42]] + varius weapons [[Neh.4.10|Neh 4:10]]; [[2Chr.26.14|2Chr 26:14]] alone [[Isa.13.18|Isa 13:18]] (context corrupt), [[Isa.22.3|Isa 22:3]]; [[Jer.51.56|Jer 51:56]]; [[Hab.3.9|Hab 3:9]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> as ***warrior***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְחָמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Zech.9.10|Zech 9:10]]; [[Zech.10.4|Zech 10:4]] in simile <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְמִיָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּק‎</span> ***like a bow of deception*** [[Hos.7.16|Hos 7:16]]; [[Ps.78.57|Ps 78:57]] (i.e. one that misses its aim; al. ***slack bow***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> collective = ***bow (-men), archers*** [[Isa.21.17|Isa 21:17]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** phrases are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּרִים אֲנָשִׁים בַּקּ‎</span> [[1Sam.31.3|1Sam 31:3]] ***archers, bowmen*** (but dubious; [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] Löhr translates, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span>; [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> as \|\| [[1Chr.10.3|1Chr 10:3]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּקּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּוֺרִים בַּקּ‎</span> [[1Chr.10.3|1Chr 10:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְטַחֲוֵי ק‎</span> [[Gen.21.16|Gen 21:16]] (see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טָתָה‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רמֵה ק‎</span> [[Jer.4.29|Jer 4:29]], compare perhaps [[Gen.21.21|Gen 21:21]] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִשָּׁת‎</span>, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשְׁקֵי ק‎</span> (see II.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשַׁק‎</span>) [[1Chr.12.2|1Chr 12:2]]b [[2Chr.17.17|2Chr 17:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺמֵי ק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.78.9|Ps 78:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּפֵשׁ הַקּ‎</span> [[Amos.2.15|Amos 2:15]] ***one grasping the bow***, (see [[Jer.46.9|Jer 46:9]] below) see also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּא יָדוֺ בַקּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.24|2Kgs 9:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְכֵּב יָֽדְךָ עַלהַֿקּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.16|2Kgs 13:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּרַח ק‎</span> ***bend*** (literally ***tread***) ***the bow***, [[Isa.5.28|Isa 5:28]] (participle passive), [[Isa.21.15|Isa 21:15]] (***id.***; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span>) [[Jer.50.14|Jer 50:14]]; [[Jer.50.29|Jer 50:29]]; [[Jer.51.3|Jer 51:3]]; [[1Chr.5.18|1Chr 5:18]]; [[1Chr.8.40|1Chr 8:40]]; [[2Chr.14.7|2Chr 14:7]]; [[Ps.37.14|Ps 37:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span>), in figure [[Ps.11.2|Ps 11:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵץ‎</span>), and, of God, [[Lam.2.4|Lam 2:4]]; [[Lam.3.12|Lam 3:12]]; [[Ps.7.13|Ps 7:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶרֶב‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּפְשֵׂי דֹּרְכֵי ק‎</span> [[Jer.46.9|Jer 46:9]] compare(figurative) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּדְרְכוֺ אֶתלְֿשׁוֺנָם קַשְׁתָּם‎</span> [[Jer.9.2|Jer 9:2]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחוּשָׁה וְנִחֲתָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Ps.18.35|Ps 18:35]] = [[2Sam.22.35|2Sam 22:35]] (read<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִחֲתָה‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִחַת‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשַׁח בַּקּ‎</span>***draw the bow*** [[1Kgs.22.34|1Kgs 22:34]] = [[2Chr.18.33|2Chr 18:33]]; [[Isa.66.19|Isa 66:19]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** ***bow*** (passing over into) figurative of ***might*** [[Gen.49.24|Gen 49:24]] (poem), [[1Sam.2.4|1Sam 2:4]]; [[Hos.1.5|Hos 1:5]]; [[Jer.49.35|Jer 49:35]]; [[Job.29.20|Job 29:20]] (compare [[Ps.37.15|Ps 37:15]], 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** above) **feminine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחוּשָׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> fig of divine judgment [[Job.20.24|Job 20:24]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵשֶׁק בַּרְזֶל‎</span>) 

**2.** ***rainbow***: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשַׁר יִהְיֶה בֶעָנָן בְּיוֺם הַנֶּשֶׁם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמַרְאֵה הַקּ‎</span> [[Ezek.1.28|Ezek 1:28]]; [[Gen.9.13|Gen 9:13]]; [[Gen.9.14|Gen 9:14]]; [[Gen.9.16|Gen 9:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֑שֶׁה וַיּאֹמֶר לְלַמֵּד בְּנֵייְֿהוּדָה‎</span> [[2Sam.1.18|2Sam 1:18]] is corrupt; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] al. omits; [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] think misplaced gloss on v[[2Sam.1.6|2Sam 1:6]] see further [[BDB#HPS|HPS]].
